instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 216-0810005 GPU chip replacement
threads.message:
i started replacing GPU a few months ago, and in the beginning, I had really bad time until I started to use higher temperatures from the top, at this point I found good results. success ratio 80-90% 
After 2 months I had a new MacBook to replace GPU, but suddenly my temp profile start to fail again and I had success  40-50%.
bought new GPU Chips from servals supplier but it didn't change the results,

i want some guidelines to help me to make a new temp profile. 
i have WDS-520
thank you

threads.title: 216-0810005 GPU chip replacement
threads.message:
"bought new GPU Chips from servals supplier"
I doubt you can find REAL new chips.
This can be the reason of your problem.
All the chinese sell "NEW" chips, all reballed in fact...

threads.title: 216-0810005 GPU chip replacement
threads.message: Ok, what I have to do ? Do you know where to buy it? Or stop gpu replacement ? :D
